item.title: RT by @emmaggarland: Had a flurry of lovely messages after this chat went out on Radio 4 this morning. It‚Äôs me banging on about my complicated relationship with my Welshness, again. I mean I‚Äôve got so much to say about it I wrote a tour show- tickets on my website! https://www.bbc.co.uk/programmes/m0018ns2

item.title: R to @emmaggarland: my second 'one to one' episode went out this morning and it's another banger i'm afraid! thank you to the brilliant @kiripritchardmc for coming on to chat about the welsh language, welsh art, and why so many welsh transplants (like us) end up moving home: https://www.bbc.co.uk/sounds/play/m0018ns2
item.dc:creator: @emmaggarland
item.description: my second 'one to one' episode went out this morning and it's another banger i'm afraid! thank you to the brilliant @kiripritchardmc for coming on to chat about the welsh language, welsh art, and why so many welsh transplants (like us) end up moving home: bbc.co.uk/sounds/play/m0018n‚Ä¶

item.title: RT by @emmaggarland: Hello! I am looking to speak to men - particularly in their 20s and 30s - who have run into reluctance by doctors to give them a vasectomy. A bit niche so please do retweet, I would very much appreciate it

item.title: R to @CotterLoren: thanks loren! this is so nice to hear, and yeah the pandemic really put hiraeth in overdrive. by the time i was able to make a trip back it had been so long i was even buzzing to see the maltsters.
